properties.Name: CustomerProductPreference
properties.Description: The one or more products that a customer has a preference to. This would typically be a top 10 list of products that were ordered during the past period.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: PreferenceId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Preference.

Columns.Name: CustomerProductPreferenceNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information related to Customer Product Preference.
